title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
OB: The report design currently stores the absolute path. We need to save the relative path. The property `<property name="fileName"/>E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property>` is storing the absolute path.
EB: The report design should store the relative path instead of the absolute path. The property should be `<property name="fileName">../otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property>`.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the report design.
2. View the property `<property name="fileName"/>`.
3. Observe that the absolute path is being stored.
4. Modify the property to store the relative path `<property name="fileName">../otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property>`.
5. Save the report design and verify that the relative path is now stored.
